recipe_name: Caramelised peach and cashew nut crumble
author: Richard Phillips
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. For the crumble topping, place the flour and butter into a food processor and pulse until the mixture resembles breadcrumbs. Stir in the crushed nuts and sugar. For the filling, heat the sliced peach, red wine and sugar in a pan and simmer for 4-5 minutes, until the liquid is slightly reduced. Pour the peach mixture into an ovenproof dish and top with the crumble mixture. Bake in the oven for 8-12 minutes, or until the crumble is toasted and golden-brown. For the lime yoghurt, place the yoghurt in a bowl and stir in the lime juice. Serve the crumble warm in the dish with a dollop of lime yoghurt.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz plain flour,  55g/2oz butter,  55g/2oz cashew nuts, crushed,  2 tbsp caster sugar,  1 peach, sliced,  75ml/2½fl oz red wine,  1 tbsp caster sugar,  3 tbsp Greek-style yoghurt ,  ½ lime, juice only
